New Records: Heinrich Klaasen hit 109 runs from 67 balls
Marco Jansen hit a fiery unbeaten 75
Key Match Events: South Africa pacers thrived under light and derailed the England batting innings
Kagiso Rabada took an absolute stunner off the bowling of Lungi Ngidi
Jonny Bairstow held on to a tough catch despite slipping up in the outfield
Pre-Game Insights: Both sides made changes to their line-up for this Cricket World Cup encounter in Mumbai
Temba Bavuma missed out due to an illness, with Aiden Markram captaining in his stead
England were stunned by Afghanistan in Delhi, South Africa were beaten by Netherlands in Dharamsala
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa have overcome a shock loss to Netherlands in Dharamsala and brought their Cricket World Cup campaign back on track
Their loss to Afghanistan ensures that England have only two points from the three games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reeza Hendricks hit 85 from 75 against England at Wankhede
The duo added 151 runs from merely 77 balls to help South Africa close in on 400
